description:
Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Dodo Pizza is perfect for a quick bite, a cozy family dinner, or a fun get-together with friends. It’s more than just fast food — we create our own recipes, work with trusted suppliers, and maintain quality at every step. So your food is always delicious, and delivery — fast.
CHOOSE AND ENJOY
– Hot pizzas on crispy crust with our signature sauce
– Tasty snacks — from light to hearty
– Delicious desserts for those with a sweet tooth
– Milkshakes and refreshing drinks
– Aromatic coffee for an energy boost
– Hearty breakfasts to start the day right
– Value combos to save


BUILD YOUR OWN PIZZA
– Try two flavors in one pizza
– Add or remove toppings
– Choose crust thickness


JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
– Earn dodocoins — our in-app currency — and spend them on products
– Get personalized offers and discounts, including birthday deals


ORDER YOUR WAY
– Fast delivery to your door
– Takeaway when you’re nearby
– Table ordering in-store

TRACK YOUR ORDER
– Watch your pizza being prepared via live camera in the kitchen
– Track your courier on the map in real time

HAVE FUN WHILE YOU WAIT
– Stack pizza boxes in a fun mini-game
– Create your own stickerboard for in-store display


TRAVEL WITH US
Dodo has over 1300 restaurants in 20+ countries — and just one app. No need to reinstall anything when you’re abroad. Menu, delivery, offers, and service — everything works as usual.
Download the app now and order food in just a few taps. We do our best to keep it tasty, fast, and reliable. 
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out at mobile@dodopizza.com

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

** Apple’s App of the Day in 120+ Countries **  

** Used by 2M+ Chefs Worldwide **  

"Unlimited amount of inspiration" — Netflix Superstar Ana Roš


Gronda is the #1 app for professional and home chefs. Learn from the world’s best, fine dining recipes, and connect with a global community of culinary experts. Discover inspiration, sharpen your skills, and build your personal brand as a chef.

Explore an extensive library of 50,000+ recipes from top chefs, 60+ masterclasses from industry legends, and exclusive content from chefs at starred restaurants. Use cutting-edge tools like the AI Recipe Creator to craft unique dishes, and join a community of over 2M chefs.

Subscribe to PRO to access premium content and support the chefs who inspire you. Whether you're an aspiring home chef or a seasoned professional, Gronda is your gateway to the culinary world.

GRONDA FEATURES

RECIPES FROM STARRED CHEFS 
* Find 50,000+ recipes chefs actually cook in their restaurants.  
* Exclusive content from 1,500+ chefs at starred restaurants.  
* Explore fine dining recipes and discover new inspiration for your dishes.

MASTERCLASSES FROM INDUSTRY LEGENDS
* 60+ classes from world-renowned chefs, including:  
  - Ana Roš (***), Alex Atala (**), Pascal Barbot (***), and Jan Hartwig (***).  
  - Chefs featured on the 50 Best list, including the Best Restaurant of 2024.  
* Learn techniques and tips that transform your cooking.  

ALL TOPICS COVERED
* Techniques (Sous-vide, Fermentation, Gelification, Dehydrating, Emulsifying, Freezing, Spehrification, Baking, Drying, Pressure Cooking, and many more)
* Pastry  
* Plating techniques  
* Seasonal ingredient selection  
* Flavor balancing  
* Sauce creation (Hollandaise, Béchamel, emulsifications)  
* Dessert techniques (e.g., tempering chocolate, macarons)  
* Protein preparation  
* Knife skills  

COMMUNITY OF CHEFS
* Join 2M+ chefs worldwide, from home cooks to culinary professionals.  
* Connect, share, and grow together in the only platform for real chefs.  
* Follow chefs and restaurants you love.

AI RECIPE CREATOR
* Use the power of AI to craft new variations of recipes.  
* Get creative and elevate your culinary skills.

BUILD YOUR BRAND  
* Share your recipes and creations with the community.  
* Create menus and collections with your favorite recipes. 
* Gain followers to build your reputation.  

ALSO FEATURING
* Daily inspiration from hundreds of famous chef creators.  
* Content available in English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese.  

Gronda is your ultimate culinary companion, no matter your skill level. By subscribing to PRO, you support the chefs who create the recipes and classes that inspire you.

Subscription pricing and terms:

Gronda offers an auto-renewing subscription to PRO, unlocking access to premium content and tools while supporting the chefs. Payment is charged to your iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase. Manage your subscription in your Account Settings.

Data protection: https://gronda.com/legal/privacy
Terms of use: https://gronda.com/legal/conditions-user

--------------------
Features
--------------------

MEAL PLANNER
- Easily plan your meals with a weekly or monthly overview
- Enter as many details as you want for each meal as you want, but everything is optional
- Sync you planning in real-time with your partner
- Configurable layout where you can configure the number of meals in a day you want to plan
- Based on the ingredients the app can automatically generate a shopping list
- Easy modifications with a simple drag and drop
- Print a nice looking overview the menu planning 

SHOPPING LIST
- Can be automatically generated based on your meal planning
- Also possible to do manual modifications
- Sync you shopping list in real-time with your partner
- Barcode scanner
- Enter as many details as you want for each product as you want, but everything is optional
- There is also a list of the ingredients you have available at home
- Fast delivery of groceries by Amazon Fresh

RECIPE MODULE
- Maintain all your recipes in one centralized place
- Add photo’s from your recipe book
- Add a link to a recipe website
- Plan your meals and shopping list from within this module


--------------------
Benefits
--------------------

- Avoid food waste: Because of the integrated shopping list you will only buy what you actually need.
- Save money: Meal planning allows you to buy items in bulk, which is cheaper. Next to that you never buy items that you don’t need afterwards.
- Save time: never again stand before your fridge thinking about what to cook, while you have better things to do
- Improve your health: Because of the planning and having an overview of your eating habits, you will eat more healthy
- Reduce stress: The shopping list can be automatically generated for you so you no longer have to stress about what to buy.
- Improve variety of you diet as you have a clear overview of your eating habits
- Live longer: Research have found that people who plan their meals live longer on average


--------------------
My story
--------------------

My girlfriend and I have been doing meal planning for some time now. We were looking for and app but we didn't find one that did fulfill our needs. So I decided to give it a try myself and this is a result. My girlfriend and I have already been using it for a while and now I would like to share it with the world and hopefully help many families with their food planning.




Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/meal-manager-plan-weekly-meals
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Wine Vision Fair - Your Gateway to the Wine Industry

Advanced Search & Discovery

Professional Networking

For Exhibitors:

WHY WINE VISION FAIR?

PERFECT FOR:

- Winemakers and wine producers
- Distillers and spirits manufacturers
- Wine importers and distributors
- Professional buyers and sommeliers
- Wine retailers and shop owners
- Restaurant and hotel buyers
- Wine industry professionals
- Trade visitors and enthusiasts

Download Wine Vision Fair and unlock unlimited opportunities in the global wine industry. Join thousands of professionals already connecting, discovering, and doing business through our platform.

Visit winevisionfair.com for more information about upcoming events and registration.

Mealime is a simple way for busy singles, couples, and families to plan their meals and eat healthier. Our meal plans & recipes are highly customizable so you can easily personalize a plan that works with your unique tastes and lifestyle.

Join over 5,000,000 people who have used our meal plans to eat healthier, reduce stress, lose weight, save money, and live happier, more productive lives.

Check out our top benefits and features:

1. COOK HEALTHY MEALS IN ABOUT 30 MINUTES OR LESS
We've reimagined and streamlined the cooking experience. Prepare meals quickly with our step-by-step and hassle-free cooking instructions.

You'll never again have to jump around looking for an ingredient, instruction, or piece of cookware that you may have overlooked. 

2. NO MORE STRESSFUL "WHAT SHOULD I EAT?" DECISIONS TO MAKE
Each week you'll have a personalized meal plan with simple & healthy recipes that are catered to your exact needs and preferences.

Eliminate decision fatigue after a long day's work - simply pick a recipe from your meal plan and cook it in less time than it takes to pick up an unhealthy (and expensive) takeout meal.

3. HEALTHY MEAL PLANS THAT ARE UNIQUELY YOUR OWN
With the most personalization options of any minimal-waste meal planner out there, you can cook exactly how you want to eat.

From classic, flexitarian, pescetarian, low carb, paleo, keto, vegetarian & vegan diet types to gluten free, dairy free, and a dozen more restrictions, and hundreds of individual dislikable ingredients, your meal plans will be truly personalized to your specific needs.

4. SUPER FAST GROCERY LIST & EFFORTLESS GROCERY DELIVERY
When you build a new meal plan, a grocery list of all the ingredients you'll need for the week is automatically created. Simply grab your iPhone and shop in-store or get your grocery shopping done from your phone in minutes. Mealime works with most leading grocery retailers and we're always adding more!

5. SAVE MONEY WITH MINIMAL FOOD WASTE
It's annoying when you purchase ingredients from the grocery store, cook a meal or two, and have a bunch of ingredients going bad by the end of the week, isn't it?

With Mealime, your days of wasting food are over! All meal plans are intelligently created in order to eliminate food waste as much as possible, saving you hundreds of dollars per year.

6. KEEP TRACK OF YOUR NUTRITION GOALS
Every Mealime recipe lists comprehensive nutrition information so you can easily see what you're eating. Mealime integrates with the Health app so that you can easily see all of your health information in one place!

MEAL PLANNER PRO SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Mealime is free to download and use. Should you choose to upgrade to Mealime Meal Planner Pro, we offer two auto-renewing subscription options - one at a price of £2.99 / month.

These auto-renewing subscription plans renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. If on our monthly plan, the renewal price will be £2.99/month and will continue every month until cancelled.

Payment will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in price when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal turned off by the user in Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Terms of Use
http://mealime.com/terms-of-service/

Privacy Policy
http://mealime.com/privacy-policy/

HOW TO USE CAL AI

Answer a few lifestyle questions to create your personalized nutrition plan

Track your calories and macros with AI-powered food logging*

Get instant insights to help you lose weight, gain muscle, or maintain your goals

Cal AI makes nutrition simple. No complicated tracking, no guesswork — just fast, accurate calorie and macro breakdowns so you can stay consistent and see real results.

We built Cal AI to help you feel confident and in control of your body, with tools that make progress easier and fit naturally into your routine.

NOTE: Cal AI does not provide medical advice. All nutritional recommendations are for informational purposes only. Consult a professional before making major changes to your diet.

Terms of Service: https://glacier-health-418.notion.site/HealthTrack-AI-Terms-of-Use-2ae8ac2bf95080c5b096c97b02b32692?source=copy_link

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Welcome to the new Kafeterija app — completely redesigned and freshly brewed for you.
Enjoy faster ordering, smarter loyalty rewards, and an effortless way to get your favorite coffee and meals.
Your daily ritual, now smoother than ever.

We know where you can find the flavours that fit you.  If there's one thing we know it’s food delivery. It’s our mission to bring tasty food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door so you can eat good food everyday. We'll go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or the freshest sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodora is the best food delivery and take away service in your city -- so let's take the first bite!

Check if we're in your city by downloading the app.

SO WHAT’S THE DEAL?

You’re ready and waiting to eat, we’ve all been there, dreaming of thai food, eating burgers in our dreams. Here’s what we do: first choose between delivery and Pick-Up to fit food ordering seamlessly into your schedule. Pick-Up is simple -- you make your order and then collect your food from the restaurant once it’s ready. No more queuing, ever (our app is magic). If you choose delivery, our couriers will bring the food you've been lusting after right to your door. Dreams really do come true.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (home/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They’ll prepare your food and once it’s ready, our courier bring it to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Then you eat. Food goals.

WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodora chooses your local favourites; the best food near you. Vietnamese or Italian, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be cooked with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile while you save time to do something else you love. There's a cuisine and a dish to suit every moment, and we'll help you make the first bite last.

ANYTHING ELSE?

Of course your safety is important to us. We guarantee secure, simple mobile payment, so you can eat when you're hungry and pay however you like.

TALK TO US

If you’ve ordered with us before, we’d want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/ teenage confessionals. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodora.se

For further info, visit
www.foodora.com/

Alideda - Dostava Hrane Vam omogućava da naručite dostavu hrane iz preko dve stotine restorana u Srbiji. Ukoliko želite hranu možete iz većine restorana preuzeti i sami. Plaćanje možete obaviti online na siguran način ili u gotovini. Naručivanje preko Alideda aplikacije je brže jednostavnije i sigurnije.

Dostava hrane Beograd - Najbolje restorane u Beogradu ćete pronaći na Alideda aplikaciji, tu su Pomodoro, Botako, Chaos, Agi Pasta, Fine sushies, Clemenza, Pizza Fabrika, Pizza Trkačica, Pizzagram, Don gedža, Mister Wang i mnogi drugi.

Dostava hrane Novi Sad - Panter picerja, Zarićev Vajat, Roštilj kod Jefte, Brunch, Hao Hao kineski restoran 88, Pinokio palačinke, Piccante i mnogi drugi.

Dostava pizza od 00-24 u svako doba dana i noći uz online plaćanje je pravi razlog za instaliranje ove aplikacije. 

Besplatna dostava hrane je uobičajena mada ima i onih restorana koji dostavu naplaćuju što je jasno naznačeno. 

Izbor hrane je ogroman. Pizza kaprićoza, srbijana, vezuvio, vegeterijana, ljuta, ne ljuta, slatka.. Roštilj u lepinji ili roštilj na kilogram, pljeskavice, punjene pljeskavice, gurmanske, ćevapi, vešalice, kobasice. Sve što Vam pada na pamet od hrane ćete naći na Alidedi. Naravno tu je i sve popularnija Sushi dostava. U ponudi imamo i dostavu zdrave hrane, salate, riba, bezglutenske hrane i proteinskih obroka.

Naručite hranu! Prijatno.

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Find and book Japan’s best local restaurants—before you go, or on the road!

Tabelog is Japan’s leading restaurant search and reservation app, with over 800,000 restaurants and 82 million user reviews.

From sushi and yakiniku, to ramen, izakaya, cafes, and sweets, or even a taste of home, Tabelog has everything you're craving. 

Search nearby options right from the app and reserve available seats instantly. 

You can also check for multilingual menus and cashless payment support before your visit.

Features for international travelers:
- Search popular lunch or dinner spots near your location, or anywhere in the country.
- Discover neighborhood ramen, restaurants and cafes loved by locals. 
- Find restaurants with open seats now and reserve immediately.
- Save favorite places for later.
- Restaurant recommendations for dates, family trips, solo-dining and group outings.

Tired of cooking the same 3 meals on repeat? Zest integrates a mind-blowing cooking education into your routine. Learn to cook with us through step-by-step explanations of foundational cooking concepts in fewer than 10 minutes and dishes that bring the concept to life. Our recipes are created by two former Michelin star chefs, distilled by a home chef, and cooked by you, the superstar home cook that you are (or will be). We don't assume any prior culinary knowledge. We meet you where you are and help you improve.
 
Stop copying traditional recipes - start learning from Zest. We've cooked those delicious Bon Appetit dinners. But when we took away the recipes we felt like lost puppies. Zest is designed to teach you the how's and why's of cooking. So when the recipe is gone you can confidently navigate the kitchen. The promise: Taste improvement after one dinner with Zest.

FEATURES:

STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS
We've all tried cooking a TikTok recipe. You rewatch the video 13 times to figure out what the hell is going on. Zest embeds videos throughout recipes so you can click into content when you need it. No more pausing and restarting. Learn at your own pace.
 
CONCEPT VIDEOS
Watch a short video on a new concept at your own pace and then cook recipes that reinforce what you've learned. We dive into topics like the science of tasting and the basics of seasoning, sautéing, roasting and more!

SKILL VIDEOS
Don't know how to dice an onion? Don't be embarrassed, we got you covered. Skill videos are linked in each recipe to guide you along, so you don't have to watch Gordon Ramsey on YouTube (we love his accent too).

CURATED MENU
Choose a menu to fit your preferences. Tired of wasting produce? Search for dishes including what’s already in your fridge. Got allergies? Compile safe recipes in your menu to find them when you’re ready to get cooking. 

GROCERY LIST
Shop your menu with our automated grocery list. Plus, utilize our helpful tips while you shop. Don't know what a neutral oil is? We got you covered.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Rate the recipes you cook, so we can recommend similar ones.

Feedback? Technical Issues? Killer ideas you want to contribute to make our app better? Email us at support@zestapp.co. We're always here to help and would love to chef up new ideas together!

End User Licensing Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

McDonald's Official App for Japan
The McDonald's official app offers not only daily coupons and latest information but also allows you to complete your order and payment seamlessly.



Features Available:
• Access to the Latest Coupons
Enjoy exclusive coupons that can be used in-store or through mobile orders. Show the coupon number to the staff by selecting "Use in Store" or choose a coupon from the mobile order menu category.
• Check McDonald’s Menu
Access detailed information about McDonald's products, including ingredients, allergy information, and nutritional content.
• Discover the Latest News
Find recommended news and products tailored to you right on the home screen.
• Order and pay via the App with Mobile Order
You can complete your order and payment entirely through the app. Skip the line and receive your food directly at your table (not available in certain restaurants or hours).
• Order from home and have your meal delivered by McDelivery® Service via the App.



How to Use Mobile Order:
Step 1: Log In
To use coupons or place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Choose a Restaurant
Select the restaurant where you would like to receive your order. Please check the available restaurants in the app.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items. Coupons can also be used. Please note that some coupons available for mobile orders may differ from those available at the Front Counter.
Step 4: Choose Your Pickup Method
Select from table delivery (table service), counter pickup, takeout, park & go, or Drive-Thru. Pickup options may vary by restaurant and time. Table service, park & go, and drive-thru are not available at all locations.
Step 5: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with a credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-Barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay .
Please Complete the Following Step After Arriving at the Restaurant
Step 6: Receive Your Order
Once you arrive at the restaurant, confirm your payment to start the preparation of your order. Enjoy your freshly prepared food.



How to Use McDelivery® Service:
Step 1: Log In
To place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Select Delivery Address and Time
Choose whether you want to order now or reserve a delivery time. Reservations can be made from one day to two hours prior to the desired delivery time.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items.
Step 4: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with cash, credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay . Please note that cash payments are not available at some locations.
Step 5: Receive Your Order
Our delivery staff will bring your freshly prepared meal to your specified address. If you prefer a no-contact delivery, you can select the "Leave at the Door" option when ordering.
• Please note:
  • Delivery times vary by location.
  • Orders for the breakfast menu must be placed by 10:20 AM.
  • Minimum order value is ¥1,500 (¥1,000 for breakfast).
  • A delivery fee of ¥300 applies.

InVintory: The #1 Wine Collection Platform

Discover, organize, and enjoy your wine collection like never before. InVintory is the #1 wine app for collectors, built on a sommelier-curated database of over 2 million wines. Powered by smart AI recommendations and immersive 3D cellar visualization, it’s the easiest and most accurate way to manage your wines.

[ SOMMELIER-CURATED DATABASE ]

Access the world’s most accurate wine database curated by sommeliers, not crowdsourced or sponsored data. Every bottle in your collection deserves verified details from a library of over 2 million wines.

[ YOUR CELLAR IN 3D ]

Bring your collection to life with VinLocate, a stunning 3D replica of your cellar or wine fridge. Assign bottles to exact slots, find them instantly, and experience your collection visually.

[ ADD, IMPORT & ORGANIZE ]

Add bottles by scanning labels, searching our verified database, or importing from CellarTracker, Vivino, or spreadsheets. Your entire cellar stays organized, searchable, and synced automatically.

[ AI SOMMELIER RECOMMENDATIONS ]

Meet your personal wine expert. Ask your AI Sommelier anything about wine, from food pairings and serving temperature to investment insights and personalized recommendations based on what you own.

[ SAVED LISTS & QUICK FILTERS ]

Create Saved Lists for events, tastings, or personal goals. Use Quick Filters to instantly access your ready-to-drink bottles, favorite varietals, regions, or vintage years.

[ DISCOVER NEW WINES ]

Find your next favorite bottle with advanced search and smart filters for varietal, region, and drink window. Explore expert reviews and collector insights to make confident choices.

[ CELLARSTICKERS™ (PREMIUM) ]

Label your bottles with CellarStickers™, NFC-enabled tags that let you tap any bottle to view its full details instantly. Perfect for collectors, restaurants, and storage facilities.

[ REAL-TIME VALUE TRACKER ]

Track your collection’s total worth and monitor live market prices, trends, and purchase history with professional-grade analytics.

[ OPTIMAL DRINK WINDOWS ]

Get notified when your wines reach peak maturity so you can enjoy them at the perfect time.

[ DELIVERY & INVENTORY MANAGEMENT ]

Track shipments, print barcode labels, batch-edit bottles, and export PDF or spreadsheet reports for insurance, investment, or record keeping.

[ PROTECT YOUR COLLECTION ]

Connect Govee sensors to monitor temperature and humidity, and back up your collection securely in the cloud.

[ JOIN THE COMMUNITY ]

Share tasting notes, manage wine clubs, and connect with fellow collectors in a vibrant global community.

[ SYNC ACROSS DEVICES ]

Your wine collection stays automatically synced across iPhone, iPad, and desktop.

[ UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES ]

Upgrade to unlock VinLocate 3D, CellarStickers, AI Sommelier, advanced analytics, and unlimited storage. Essential features are free forever.

Download InVintory today and take the guesswork out of collecting.

Terms of Use: https://invintory.com/terms-conditions
Website: https://invintory.com
Desktop App: https://app.invintory.com

Yelp has over 135 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
• Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
• Make reservations, order delivery or pickup—all from your phone
• Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
• Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
• Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
• Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
• Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
• Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_CA
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

Welcome to Eatr - the ultimate companion for everyone from cooking novices to seasoned chefs! 
Our app is designed to guide you through a culinary adventure tailored just for you. Whether you're pressed for time or looking to indulge in a leisurely cooking spree, Eatr has you covered.

Time Management in Your Kitchen:
Choose your cooking time - from quick 15-minute bites to sumptuous meals under an hour - and let Eatr plan your menu. Busy schedules have met their match with our smart, time-conscious recipes.

Get Inspired:
Dive into thousands of mouth-watering recipes. With Eatr, discover daily inspiration and never run out of ideas for your next meal.

Personalized Skills Journey:
Whether you’re just starting out or are a kitchen pro, Eatr grows with you. Select your skill level and get recipes that challenge and excite you, all the while expanding your culinary prowess.

Dietary Preferences? We Listen:
Keto? Vegan? Pescatarian? No matter your diet, Eatr offers personalized recommendations to keep you aligned with your lifestyle choices. Sticking to your diet was never this effortless or delightful.

Powerful Filters for Tailored Search:
With robust search filters for cuisine, diet, meal type, and more, find exactly what you fancy with just a few taps.


Ratings and Feedback:
Be part of a community where your opinion matters. Rate recipes, helping others and yourself to the best-tasting dishes.

Nutritional Insight:
Stay informed with detailed nutritional information for each recipe, ensuring you meet your health and fitness goals.



Easy Cooking with Step-by-Step Guides:
Clear, concise, and easy-to-follow instructions take the guesswork out of cooking. Enjoy the process as much as the result!

Ali to nije sve! Sa Mr.D možete naručiti i dostavu iz marketa do Vaših vrata.
Sve što treba da uradite je da unesete adresu, ubacite proizvode u korpu i narudžbina stiže kod Vas! Time ćete uštedeti Vaše vreme a često i novac.
Da li Vam je potrebno još razloga? Imamo ih! Pronađite specijalne ponude i popuste koje smo pripremili za naše korisnike.
Vašu narudžbinu možete platiti online ili gotovinom na adresi.
Kako Vam se čini? Vreme je da isprobate Mr.D?
Ukoliko imate dodatna pitanja, budite slobodni da nas kontaktirate na kontakt@misterd.rs i vrlo rado ćemo Vam pomoći.

ENG:
Mr.D is your favorite choice for online delivery with more than 1000 shops in Belgrade, Novi Sad, Nis, Kragujevac, Subotica, Leskovac, Krusevac, Cacak and Pancevo, which allows you to quickly and easily find restaurants that deliver food to your address. But that’s not all! With Mr.D you can also order delivery from the supermarkets up to your door.

О’КЕЙ — мобильное приложение одной из крупнейших розничных сетей России.
Мы специализируемся на торговле продуктами питания, а качество и свежесть продуктов является нашим абсолютным приоритетом.
 
В О’КЕЙ вы найдете: > 30 000 товаров; > 5 000 наименований самых свежих продуктов; > 500 готовых блюд собственного производства; качественные и свежие продукты по выгодным ценам!
Мы развиваем стратегию омниканальности – вы можете выбрать удобный формат совершения покупок: заказать доставку продуктов на дом или посетить широкую сеть гипермеркетов.
Наши клиенты могут воспользоваться уникальной программой лояльности – копить и тратить бонусные баллы, как в гипермаркетах так и при покупках онлайн.
 
Используя наше новое приложение, вы получаете:
 
ШИРОКИЙ АССОРТИМЕНТ
> 30 000 товаров на полках гипермаркетов, с возможностью заказать доставку продуктов на дом, в офис или на дачу.
 
АКЦИИ И СКИДКИ
Узнавайте о скидках и акциях в гипермаркетах сети О’КЕЙ!
 
ДОСТАВКА ПРОДУКТОВ
Мы осуществляем доставку продуктов питания по Москве, Санкт-Петербургу, Московской и Ленинградской областях. Предлагаем альтернативу отсутствующим позициям при сборке заказа. В любой момент вы можете отказаться от замены или любого другого продукта – мы вернем стоимость.
Открыта быстрая доставка продуктов в течение 90 минут.
 
ВСЕГДА СВЕЖЕЕ
Фрукты, овощи, мясо, рыба, молочная продукция перевозятся в машинах-рефрижераторах с разными режимами температуры. Мы знаем, сколько градусов нужно для хранения каждого продукта!
 
С НАМИ УДОБНО
Создавайте шаблоны с любыми товарами или разрешите нашему сканеру доступ к камере, чтобы он смог находить продукт по штрих-коду на упаковке, – все это делает процесс заказа более быстрым и удобным.
 
Желаем приятных покупок вместе с О’КЕЙ
